function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty in using early small sample data to predict the epidemic situation","Impact":"Inaccurate predictions of epidemic spread and severity","Mitigation":"Use a larger sample size and incorporate more data sources for predictions","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling and data analysis tools","People":"Public health authorities, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Differences in population distribution, population flow, and medical resource detection affecting the spread of early epidemic","Impact":"Unequal spread of the epidemic and resource allocation","Mitigation":"Implement targeted interventions based on regional factors and improve medical resource distribution","Technologies":"GIS mapping, mobile tracking applications, medical resource management systems","People":"Regional health authorities, government agencies","Owner":"Regional health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Difficulty in confirming the actual number of infected people who had already exited but had not been tested or had no symptoms","Impact":"Underreporting of cases and potential for undetected transmission","Mitigation":"Enhance testing strategies, implement serological surveys, and monitor asymptomatic cases","Technologies":"Rapid diagnostic tests, serological testing kits, surveillance systems","People":"Healthcare providers, public health agencies","Owner":"Healthcare providers, public health agencies"}]}
